osvSchema.details: The cam_get_device_priv function does not check the type of handle being returned (device/session/link). This would lead to invalid type usage if a wrong handle is passed to it.

description_data.value: The cam_get_device_priv function does not check the type of handle being returned (device/session/link). This would lead to invalid type usage if a wrong handle is passed to it.
